fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Food safety policy.  
Nutrition policy 
Food/beverage safety assessment opinions and guidelines.
membership: Professional societies related to life sciences, food safety, nutrition, bio-based economy.
relevant_communication: Food safety and nutrition safety assessment, policy implementation, PR and communication activities in behalf of clients, both on European and global (e.g. FAO, WHO, CFS, OIE) level.
legal_status: BV ('besloten vennootschap' according to Dutch law)
goals__remit: ScienceConsult offers over twenty years of experience in health-related science and its management in food/beverage and other life sciences. Key areas of expertise are general management and worldwide representation of international associations, stakeholder interactions, food/beverage regulatory affairs, food safety, nutrition, product development, marketing support, business development, second opinions and strategic support. ScienceConsult has access to a large scientific network in the food and beverage industry, government and academia.
